name: STEALTH BUTCHER MY NEIGHBOR
description:
SECRET HOUSE - SCARY ADVENTURE GAME

There is a legend about a stealth butcher. You moved into another state. This small town has a very quiet neighborhood. One of the neighbors behaves very suspiciously. Go into his house and find out the cause!


This is an FPS game, which offers you mystery, unsolved case. Use the inventory to get over all the traps and avoid the butcher! More and more interesting tasks are waiting for you! Read the instructions and execute them! Be very carefull, because he’s always at home and keeps an eye on the other neighbors. If you see him run as fast as you can, he will not let you go!


Features:

FPS view
Interesting tasks
Easy control
Collectable items
